Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: Myself, first of all, I am a Jew. And that is the most important thing for me

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that Israel is much stronger than many of its leaders

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: I am working on the assumption that in the future there will be no Jews in Gaza

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: A people cannot exist if there is no social solidarity

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: I have absolute faith in the correctness of my course

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States cannot live with terror

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: I know more about wheat and olive trees than I do about politics

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: Every leaving of a Jewish community is a most difficult thing

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot teach a crab to walk straight

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is simply the name for the desire and the pursuit of the whole

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: Open your mouth and shut your eyes and see what Zeus will send you

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: Characteristics of a popular politician: a horrible voice, bad breeding, and a vulgar manner

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: Wise people, even though all laws were abolished, would still lead the same life

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's homeland is wherever he prospers

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: Quickly, bring me a beaker of wine, so that I may wet my mind and say something clever

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: Under every stone lurks a politician

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: The wise learn many things from their enemies

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: Hunger knows no friend but its feeder

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: Make your life a mission - not an intermission

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: Improvement begins with I

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: The fewer the facts, the stronger the opinion

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: Telling a teenager the facts of life is like giving a fish a bath

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: A consultant is someone who saves his client almost enough to pay his fee

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The road to success is always under construction

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Concentration comes out of a combination of confidence and hunger

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Concentration, Confidence, Competitive urge, Capacity for enjoyment

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: You must play boldly to win

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Golf is deceptively simple and endlessly complicated

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I never quit trying. I never felt that I didn't have a chance to win

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Success in golf depends less on strength of body than upon strength of mind and character

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The most rewarding things you do in life are often the ones that look like they cannot be done

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: What other people may find in poetry or art museums, I find in the flight of a good drive

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do not believe you can do it then you have no chance at all

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe the target of anything in life should be to do it so well that it becomes an art

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: The moral values I've learnt in my life I've learnt through football

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: He made the impossible possible

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: I think in England you eat too much sugar and meat and not enough vegetables

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: It's silly to work hard the whole week and then spoil it by not preparing properly before the game

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: As a coach you can influence the diet of your players. You can point out what is wrong

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: I think training of better Youth Coaches is essential

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: Sol has experience, pace and physical power, which nobody else has together

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot say that you are happy when you don't win

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to go to Iceland to see the northern lights

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I have therapy. Every day. I read a bit of Freud; I try to be a better person. Every day

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in the Fifties and Sixties and remember how unpleasant all kinds of food could be then

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was 13, I decided I was British and was going to stay that way

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I questioned the blind faith demanded by my religion, which was Islam

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: Stick a camera up in an Indian village, and thousands of people come to watch

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I was lucky enough to be launched into the marketplace with the blessing of a series like 'Jewel.'

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: If people ever stop making films about India, I'd never work again

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I jumped at the chance of doing 'Holby.' It's a great show

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: There was so much racism when I was a kid, but it was also ignorant

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn about equality in history and civics, but you find out life is not really like that

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to get to the stage in life where going for it is more important than winning or losing

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: Clothes and manners do not make the man; but when he is made, they greatly improve his appearance

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: A wise person decides slowly but abides by these decisions

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a syndrome in sports called 'paralysis by analysis.'

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: Let me put it this way: I think Republicans tend to keep the ball in play, Democrats go for broke

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest tragedy in mankind's entire history may be the hijacking of morality by religion

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: There is hopeful symbolism in the fact that flags do not wave in a vacuum

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: How inappropriate to call this planet Earth when it is quite clearly Ocean

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in astrology; I'm a Sagittarius and we're skeptical

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: Human judges can show mercy. But against the laws of nature, there is no appeal

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: Our lifetime may be the last that will be lived out in a technological society

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't pretend we have all the answers. But the questions are certainly worth thinking about

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Any truth is better than indefinite doubt

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there is no imagination there is no horror

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I never guess. It is a shocking habit destructive to the logical faculty

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't command our love, but we can our actions

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all ghosts the ghosts of our old loves are the worst

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are naturally secretive, and they like to do their own secreting

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: The most difficult crime to track is the one which is purposeless

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: A trusty comrade is always of use; and a chronicler still more so

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more sad than the death of an illusion

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: True creativity often starts where language ends

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is never to let your actions be influenced by your fears

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: The principle mark of genius is not perfection but originality, the opening of new frontiers

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: The more original a discovery, the more obvious it seems afterwards

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: Prometheus is reaching out for the stars with an empty grin on his face

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: The most persistent sound which reverberates through man's history is the beating of war drums

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: A publisher who writes is like a cow in a milk bar

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: The prerequisite of originality is the art of forgetting, at the proper moment, what we know

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: The definition of the individual was: a multitude of one million divided by one million

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: The theater is so endlessly fascinating because it's so accidental. It's so much like life

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Betrayal is the only truth that sticks

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Let you look sometimes for the goodness in me, and judge me not

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: A good newspaper, I suppose, is a nation talking to itself

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: You specialize in something until one day you find it is specializing in you

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: All we are is a lot of talking nitrogen

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: The structure of a play is always the story of how the birds came home to roost

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Certainly the most diverse, if minor, pastime of literary life is the game of Find the Author

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: If I see an ending, I can work backward

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: I create art. It's kinda abstract

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an animal lover

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: People who are scared don't live life

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really into simple things - things you could wear every day

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: Me jumping on a song with Ariana Grande is just showing versatility, you know what I'm saying?

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy, so I just want to project that happiness through my music to make other people happy

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no racism with the Internet

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: Racism been over. It's the old people that keep on holding on to it

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: If I was just to shut up, I wouldn't be a true artist

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, you can't take my love for my people away

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a gangster, bro

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is almost like a religion, for me at least

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to exfoliate, you know?

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: New York gave me hell for that 'Purple Swag,' man. They didn't respect me until 'Peso.'

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: Purple lipstick? Naw, that looks stupid on all girls!

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: Nowadays, everybody wanna be weird. We know how to manifest being weird

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: Design my own line? No, I just like the culture

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to model when I was younger

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm getting my respect as a video director. The fashion industry respects me and knows who I am

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: I like women. I love women

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: I could never be with a woman who felt like she needs to change me

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: Your best T-shirt should be like your bed; it just feels like you are home when you are in it

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no text that can replace a loving touch when someone we love is hurting

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: Steve Jobs was a pretty complicated character and somewhat a psychologically complicated guy

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy wherever I go, whatever I do. I'm happy in Iowa, I'm happy here in California

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: I am only young once, who cares if I'm a goofball!

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: When your wife calls, you have to take it, no matter what you're doing

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: The scruffier your beard, the sharper you need to dress

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: Wear a belt! It's an easy way to pull together your outfit. Just be sure to match it to your shoes

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: The master's tools will never dismantle the master's house

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: Only by learning to live in harmony with your contradictions can you keep it all afloat

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: Each time you love, love as deeply as if it were forever

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: Our visions begin with our desires

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is very short and what we have to do must be done in the now

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no new ideas. There are only new ways of making them felt

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: In other words, I would be giving in to a myth of sameness which I think can destroy us

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: Your silence will not protect you

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: The learning process is something you can incite, literally incite, like a riot

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: As soon as white folks say a play's good, the theater is jammed with blacks and whites

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: All art is political in the sense that it serves someone's politics

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: My plays are ultimately about love, honor, duty, betrayal

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your hands moving. Writing is rewriting

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything you want to know, you ask the characters

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: How do we transform loss? ... Time's healing balm is essentially a hoax

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The exact day I became a poet was April 1, 1965, the day I bought my first typewriter

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to participate in life, you have to deny your identity

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I first got involved in theater in 1968, at the height of a social tumult. I was a poet

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Suffice it to say, I'm not poor

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to bring an end to long-standing conflict, you have to be prepared to compromise

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: By helping others, you will learn how to help yourselves

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as there is no law in Burma, any individual here can be arrested at any time

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do nothing you get nothing

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: Since we live in this world, we have to do our best for this world

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were the blushing kind, I would blush to be called a hero

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a time to be quiet and a time to talk

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: War is not the only arena where peace is done to death

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, 'revolution' simply means radical change

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm feeling a little delicate

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: If your dream is only about you, it's too small

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be an old lady, with my cane, shouting, 'Action!' and 'Cut!'

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: All the films I do, I write the scripts, I direct

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't go to film school. I got my education on the set as a niche publicist in the film industry

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: Film school was a privilege I could not afford

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: Every filmmaker imbues a movie with their own point of view

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually make films with $2 and a paper clip

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not enough even to have one black Barbie... because black women are not a monolith

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: Nonviolence is pretty ballsy, pretty advanced weaponry

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell the stories that are of interest to me

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Inspiration for my music just comes from, you know, my life experiences

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the kind of person who always likes to be doing something

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: I liked being a minor because you can't get into trouble. Now I just have to try and behave myself

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I would probably die without my eyeliner, but besides that I'm pretty basic

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: When I tour, I stuff fridges full of organic food and stick to that

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't fight. I don't believe in it

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always looked for ways to give back because I think it's a responsibility we all share

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Why should I care what other people think of me? I am who I am. And who I wanna be

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: My songs aren't bubble gum pop dance songs and I don't have background dancers on every single song

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no idols. I admire work, dedication and competence

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: The danger sensation is exciting. The challenge is to find new dangers

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are fitted in a racing car and you race to win, second or third place is not enough

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: On a given day, a given circumstance, you think you have a limit

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: Because in a split second, it's gone

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not designed to come second or third. I am designed to win

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear is exciting for me

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: Women - always in trouble with them, but can't live without them

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning is the most important. Everything is consequence of that

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no small accidents on this circuit

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: People are the key to success or extraordinary success

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellence is a great starting point for any new organisation but also an unending journey

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot get into business for the fashion of it

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: We entered the global market only in the end-'80s, and that was because imports became more liberal

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent is in short supply everywhere. At Wipro, we are training nonengineers to be engineers

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: Customers are now driven by trying to optimize value

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellence can be as strong a uniting force as solid vision

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellence endures and sustains. It goes beyond motivation into the realms of inspiration

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: Private sector cannot substitute the role of the government in primary education

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: In any software work, you have IT consultancy competence required to build the systems

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people my age think stand up sucks

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: I weirdly do consider myself an optimist about love

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a rapper is about being cool, but being a comedian, you're not supposed to be the coolest guy

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand-up comedy is a raunchy profession

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the brand Band of Outsiders. Their suits are cut really slim, for smaller framed gentlemen

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a dishwasher at one of those Japanese places that cook on your table. Not too fun

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of obsessed with food. I like to eat

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: London seems to be a town with a lot of comedy fans and people that really enjoy stand-up

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you become a comedian, you accept that people are just going to yell stuff at you

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess my music taste is pretty predictable: I like new indie rock stuff, older stuff

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion will last forever. It will exist always. It will exist in its own way in each era

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important to make women feel confident, because I think they are more important than men

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman is like an actress: she's always onstage

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to speak directly with a star, not her stylist

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: Karl Lagerfeld never touched a pair of scissors in his life

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather die than see my face in a car advertisement

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: Bill Cunningham... he knows fashion better than anybody

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: I work for women. I only think for them. If I didn't like women, I wouldn't do this job

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Vogue' remains while its fashion editors come and go

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: The foundation of beauty is the body

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have idols. Play like anyone you care about but try to be yourself while you're doing so

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: Water from the white fountain didn't taste any better than from the black fountain

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: Blues is a tonic for whatever ails you. I could play the blues and then not be blue anymore

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to connect my guitar to human emotions

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anybody steals anything; all of us borrow

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody wants to go to Heaven, but no one wants to die to get there!

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody loves me but my mother, and she could be jivin', too

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm no good with chords. I'm horrible with chords

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been married twice. Most women would rather not be married to a traveling blues singer

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is the meat of life, pleasure the dessert

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: It is only the farmer who faithfully plants seeds in the Spring, who reaps a harvest in the Autumn

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy... is a mental cancer

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Real riches are the riches possessed inside

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: He best keeps from anger who remembers that God is always looking upon him

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: To make headway, improve your head

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: The man who has won millions at the cost of his conscience is a failure

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth doesn't hurt unless it ought to

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: A shady business never yields a sunny life

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: The way positive reinforcement is carried out is more important than the amount
